channel.title: Slaypk P2P lvl 1350 boss, blood demon boss(xmasCracker drops! 30min afk 75x XP)
channel.description:
[img]http://s28.postimg.org/i0gcakr8t/topbanner.png[/img] [b]YOU HAVE COME TO THE RIGHT SPOT.[b] 75x Experience Rates[/b] *Mac user friendly*
[b][url=http://Slaypk.no-ip.org]Slaypk World Forums[/url][/b]
General store has ammies and potions Master Fisher gives [b]FREE Swordfish. 99 max stat! slaypk p2p!
Get a Party hat from GREEN DRAGS at the lava maze!!!! Try your shot to get a SLAY PKER AXE from chronozon the blood demon. [img]http://s22.postimg.org/706i7bwnl/screenshot8.png[/img]
[b]Introducing Zerdoga! (level 1360)[/b] [img]http://s10.postimg.org/jeue22wex/screenshot5.png[/img] **Edgeville shop sells gauntlets, strength potions,Super potion sets, Prayer potions, and ammys.**[/b]
Pure Pk Square-- 1-10 def pures only.(boxed off area in the wilderness to have low level wars) P2p wilderness
[b]Commands[/b] *** ::help (to show a list of commands available)*** [b]::buy (buy arrows,bolts, runes quickly)[/b] ::dm ( takes you and another to death match to 1 v 1) [b]::varrock (tellys you by bank on edge of varrock wild)[/b] [b]::edge (tellys you on the road by edgeville wild)[/b] [b]::dragons (tellys you to dragons in the wilderness)[/b] ::skull (will skull your character for a set amount of time) ::castle (tellys you to the castle) ::online (shows a list of the players online, it can also be seen on the Homepage) ::fatigue (sets your fatigue to 100%, so you don't earn unwanted experience) ::say (to talk globally with everyone in the world) [b] ::wildy ( see whos in the wild)[/b] [b]The Website[/b] [url=http://slaypk.no-ip.org/]Click here to go to website[/url] Client download is on the homepage -> Left hand side. Any problems? There is a guide there as well.
Crazy Lotterys! [img]http://s27.postimg.org/ocxypw91f/screenshot17.png[/img] [b]make money[/b] When first starting out you pop up in edgeville. There is a nice area where you can immediately start mining or fishing to make money. If this skilling is not your cup of tea then the monsters in edgeville drops decent to get you started out fast. chickens drops coins, 9 man drops up to addy 2h, full iron, decent coins. 31 Skellys drop decent stuff and coins, Guards drop decent coins and random ruby ammys. Once you feel confident then you can venture in the wilderness where you wil get double experience rates. Also, the monsters in the wilderness drop good stuff. 13 alter is filled with lesser demons and outside is a couple of greaters.. dropping decents cash and up to rune b axes, and r2h's. ::Dragons range them and loot. Black Demons drop rune armours and wepons, coins, bloods, deaths and they are found in the wilderness north of the castle inside of the bandit camp.... if you dont want to walk then simply use the portal in edgeville to get there. LAVA maze is the prime location where there is green dragons that drop cash bloods and rune weapons. at the end of the maze there is a ladder to get to the only king black dragon in the game. [img]http://i18.servimg.com/u/f18/19/27/46/11/screen15.png[/img]

item.title: Slaypk P2P lvl 1350 boss, blood demon boss(xmasCracker drops! 30min afk 75x XP)
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:


[b]YOU HAVE COME TO THE RIGHT SPOT. 75x Experience Rates
Mac user friendly

Slaypk World Forums

General store has ammies and potions
Master Fisher gives [b]FREE Swordfish.
99 max stat!
slaypk p2p!

Get a Party hat from GREEN DRAGS at the lava maze!!!
Try your shot to get a SLAY PKER AXE from chronozon the blood demon.

Introducing Zerdoga! (level 1360)

Edgeville shop sells gauntlets, strength potions,Super potion sets, Prayer potions, and ammys.[/b]

Pure Pk Square-- 1-10 def pures only.(boxed off area in the wilderness to have low level wars)
P2p wilderness

Commands
*** ::help (to show a list of commands available)***
::buy (buy arrows,bolts, runes quickly)
::dm ( takes you and another to death match to 1 v 1)
::varrock (tellys you by bank on edge of varrock wild)
::edge (tellys you on the road by edgeville wild)
::dragons (tellys you to dragons in the wilderness)
::skull (will skull your character for a set amount of time)
::castle (tellys you to the castle)
::online (shows a list of the players online, it can also be seen on the Homepage)
::fatigue (sets your fatigue to 100%, so you don’t earn unwanted experience)
::say (to talk globally with everyone in the world)
::wildy ( see whos in the wild)
The Website
Click here to go to website
Client download is on the homepage -> Left hand side. Any problems? There is a guide there as well.

Crazy Lotterys!

make money
When first starting out you pop up in edgeville. There is a nice area where you can immediately start mining or fishing to make money.
If this skilling is not your cup of tea then the monsters in edgeville drops decent to get you started out fast.
chickens drops coins, 9 man drops up to addy 2h, full iron, decent coins.
31 Skellys drop decent stuff and coins,
Guards drop decent coins and random ruby ammys.
Once you feel confident then you can venture in the wilderness where you wil get double experience rates. Also, the monsters in the wilderness drop good stuff.
13 alter is filled with lesser demons and outside is a couple of greaters… dropping decents cash and up to rune b axes, and r2h’s.
::Dragons range them and loot.
Black Demons drop rune armours and wepons, coins, bloods, deaths and they are found in the wilderness north of the castle inside of the bandit camp…
if you dont want to walk then simply use the portal in edgeville to get there.
LAVA maze is the prime location where there is green dragons that drop cash bloods and rune weapons.
at the end of the maze there is a ladder to get to the only king black dragon in the game.
